title: How to Change the Username on Your CoC Account: Android & iOS

steps.title: Open Clash of Clans.
steps.content: Open Clash of Clans. Before you can change your name in Clash of Clans , you must have raised your Town Hall to at least level 5. If you haven't done this yet, keep playing the game until you level up enough to change your name.

steps.title: Tap the Settings icon in the lower-right corner.
steps.content: Tap the Settings icon in the lower-right corner. It's located above the large Shop button.

steps.title: Tap More Settings.
steps.content: Tap More Settings . This button is in the lower-right corner of the settings menu, directly underneath Parent's Guide .

steps.title: Tap Change Name.
steps.content: Tap Change Name . This is the first option in the "More Settings" menu. When you tap this button, the game will warn you that only your first name change is free. If you want to change your name again in the future, it will cost Gems. [1] X Research source Once you use your free name change, the next name change will cost 500 Gems . Each name change after that will cost an additional 500 Gems, increasing in price until you reach the cap of 10,000 Gems. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your new desired name twice.
steps.content: Enter your new desired name twice. After entering your desired name the first time, the game will ask you to confirm your username by typing it a second time.

steps.title: Confirm your username change.
steps.content: Confirm your username change. Before the game will change your name, it will ask you to do a final confirmation. Type "CONFIRM" in the text box when prompted to change your name.

steps.title: Tap Okay to change your name.
steps.content: Tap Okay to change your name. Your name is changed automatically. If you decide you're not happy with your new name and want to change it again, note that there is a one-week cooldown between name changes.
